page.title: 04Cults Hill
page.content: Cults hill dominates the southeastern corner of the locality, overlooking the village and the River Eden below. Midway up the hill is Cults farm and beyond it a{limeworks}overlooks the farm and cottages below. The farm consists of a{farm house}and four cottages for the farm workers.The limeworkers are housed beyond the farm.A nearby field is currently being dug for lime.Across from the limeworks is a track to the{old Smithy}but the building was knocked down long ago. Cults has had a few businesses in the past.Those businesses,now gone were two Smithy's and another farm.Only the lime and{brickworks}still remain. The hill itself when viewed from below is a pleasant aspect with rolling fields and wooded areas.
